channel.title: Infiltration in Bowser's Castle FM 2 (15/16) Day 2 - Death of a Greenie
channel.description:
# [color=#ff0000]W[/color][color=#ff0400]e[/color][color=#ff0700]l[/color][color=#ff0b00]c[/color][color=#ff0f00]o[/color][color=#ff1200]m[/color][color=#ff1600]e[/color] [color=#ff1d00]m[/color][color=#ff2100]y[/color] [color=#ff2800]m[/color][color=#ff2c00]i[/color][color=#ff2f00]n[/color][color=#ff3300]i[/color][color=#ff3600]o[/color][color=#ff3a00]n[/color][color=#ff3e00]s[/color][color=#ff4100].[/color] [color=#ff4900]W[/color][color=#ff4c00]e[/color] [color=#ff5300]h[/color][color=#ff5700]a[/color][color=#ff5b00]v[/color][color=#ff5e00]e[/color] [color=#ff6600]a[/color] [color=#ff6d00]t[/color][color=#ff7000]h[/color][color=#ff7400]r[/color][color=#ff7800]e[/color][color=#ff7b00]a[/color][color=#ff7f00]t[/color] [color=#f18000]i[/color][color=#e98100]n[/color] [color=#db8300]t[/color][color=#d48300]h[/color][color=#cc8400]i[/color][color=#c58500]s[/color] [color=#b78600]c[/color][color=#af8700]a[/color][color=#a88800]s[/color][color=#a18800]t[/color][color=#9a8900]l[/color][color=#938a00]e[/color][color=#8b8a00],[/color] [color=#7d8c00]r[/color][color=#768d00]e[/color][color=#6e8d00]m[/color][color=#678e00]o[/color][color=#608f00]v[/color][color=#598f00]e[/color] [color=#4a9100]i[/color][color=#439200]t[/color] [color=#359300]a[/color][color=#2d9400]t[/color] [color=#1f9500]o[/color][color=#189600]n[/color][color=#109700]c[/color][color=#099700]e[/color][color=#029800].[/color]
### Hosted by [color=#589271]S[/color][color=#57a278]c[/color][color=#56b27e]u[/color][color=#67bf89]t[/color][color=#78cc94]t[/color][color=#7889cc]l[/color][color=#6573a7]e[/color][color=#525c81]p[/color][color=#434b6a]u[/color][color=#333a53]g[/color]
### Rules https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Mushroom Kingdom Infiltrators will talk through a seperate Discord chat Boo can speak with the dead through a forum dm All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found below. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone has reached majority, they will be executed and their class will be flipped. Executions end the Day
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: **[color=red]Random Starting Infiltrator[/color] **/** [color=lime]Midbus[/color]** **[color=red]Mario[/color] / [color=lime]Cackletta[/color]** **[color=red]Luigi[/color] / [color=lime]Fawful[/color]** **[color=green]Bowser Jr[/color]** **[color=green]Minion Investigative[/color]** **[color=green]Minion Support[/color]** **[color=green]Random Minion[/color]** **[color=green]Random Minion[/color]** **[color=green]Random Minion[/color]** **[color=green]Random Minion[/color]** **[color=green]Random Minion[/color]** **[color=green]Random Minion[/color]** **[color=green]Random Minion[/color]** **[color=green]Random Minion[/color] / [color=grey]Non Killing Neutral[/color]** **[color=grey]Wario/Waluigi[/color]** **[color=grey]Non Killing Neutral[/color]**
#### Class cap is 2
## Classcards: [Link](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/infiltration-in-bowsers-castle-official-class-cards-changes-thread/58206?u=pug)
## Converts are no longer a secret to all of us
**bold means that the player has confirmed** ### Living Players: 1. **PoisonedSquid** 2. **PKR** 4. **Firekitten** 5. **Boss110** 6. **eevee** 7. **Memesky** 8. **Htm** 3. **disquieted** 9. **Margaret** 10. **Sam17z** 11. ~~Munstrish~~ -> **Captain** 12. **Wolfy** 13. **MaximusPrime** 14. **Techwolves** 15. **Solic** 16. **Clover**
**Backups:** Captain Blizer Luxy
Spectators: Twil1ight, Simod
## Graveyard: My sanity **HAHA ORIGINAL JOKE** - Day 0 **Wolfy - [color=green]Luigi[/color] - Died Night 1**
## also for all those who ask. I am Bowser
### Timestamps: [Day 1 - Bowseroli Bowseroli, Give Me the Peachuoli](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/infiltration-in-bowsers-castle-fm-2-signups-16-16/66450/179?u=pug)
